2068390.name: Axis of Power
2068390.description:
Axis of Power is a 3D Fighting Game that aims to bring the thrill of tight controls and fresh mechanics to veterans of the genre, and a vibrant cast of expressive characters baring differing personalities, playstyles, and powers to all. It is unlike any other fighter, though it shares important fundamentals with industry giants. AOP is built from the ground up to be technically and visually unique, and it is perfect for players that wish to take on a true challenge with unrivaled branching options between animations.

Game Features
  • 10 playable Fighters
  • Dynamic stages
  • Customization Mode - change clothing, colors, and companions!
  • Online and offline modes
  • Special Fighting modes
  • Cutscenes detailing motivation and story
  • & Endless replay value!

Note: This game is still in development. Designs & animations are not finalized. Feel free to follow this project on Discord & Wishlist it!

Disclaimer: this game will not release in 2023. It is and will remain in development until it is ready to be enjoyed properly. Your patience and understand is VERY much appreciated!
2068390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
